parts.label: Verse 1
parts.text: Amazing grace, how sweet the sound, that saved a wretch like me.

parts.label: Verse 2
parts.text: 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear, and grace my fears relieved.

parts.label: Chorus
parts.text: I once was lost, but now am found, was blind but now I see.

parts.label: Verse 1
parts.text: O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder, consider all the worlds Thy Hands have made.

parts.label: Chorus
parts.text: Then sings my soul, my Savior God, to Thee, how great Thou art, how great Thou art!

parts.label: Verse 1
parts.text: Light of the world, You stepped down into darkness, opened my eyes, let me see.

parts.label: Chorus
parts.text: Here I am to worship, here I am to bow down, here I am to say that You're my God.

parts.label: Bridge
parts.text: I'll never know how much it cost to see my sin upon that cross.
